title: Moonlight Drawn by Clouds - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Gender Bender   Historical   Josei   Romance
tags: Adapted to Drama   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Cross-dressing   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Mysterious Past   Politics   Royalty   Secret Identity
author: Yoon Yi Soo   윤이수
description:
19th century, Joseon (ancient Korea).

SamNom, a romance counselor known to have the ability to solve any problem related to women, has a secret. He is actually a girl. A chance encounter with the Flower Scholar changes her fate. Now she is a eunuch… and has landed herself in forbidden territory. She has jumped into the secret world of eunuchs. Her counseling is now about to turn the palace upside-down.>
